item.title: Rediscovering the Hungarian language with a children's book
item.description: 2023 hasn’t been a big reading year for me. I tend to alternate very heavily between watching movies and tv shows, playing videogames and reading books. This year I’ve been playing a lot of videogames with what little free time I have. Nevertheless, I do have a candidate for my book of the year 2023: A majom mamája. The cover for A majom mamája. The book is written by Julia Donaldson, an English writer mostly known for The Gruffalo or Room on the Broom, and illustrated by Axel Scheffler.
